attributes.action: Request an urgent debate in Parliament to Bring back the Death Penalty
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After the death of Baby P we the undersigned wish for the government to review the death penalty in the UK for those who are found guilty without resonable doubt of murder or severe child abuse.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
